summary: This document is an email communication from Jeffrey Epstein to Tom Pritzker, with Jes Staley copied. The email discusses confidentiality and attorney-client privilege, indicating the sensitive nature of the information contained within. It emphasizes the prohibition of unauthorized use or disclosure of the communication.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein

keyFacts: The email is marked as confidential and may contain attorney-client privileged information.
The communication is intended only for the use of the addressee, indicating its sensitive nature.
Unauthorized use, disclosure, or copying of the email is strictly prohibited.
